New Records: India won their second ICC T20 World Cup title
Key Match Events: Bumrah broke partnerships at crucial moments
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli confirmed his T20 international retirement after the match
Kohli said he was grateful to get the job done for the team on the day it mattered the most
Miscellaneous Highlights: India ended their 13-year wait for an ICC Cricket World Cup trophy
South Africa came close to winning their maiden world title but were unable to get over the line
Others: The match was played at the Kensington Oval in Bridgetown, Barbados
